name: tamari
description: Tamari is a self-hosted habit and routine tracker with streaks, reminders, and goal management. It provides a clean, mobile-friendly dashboard for daily tracking.
features: Habit tracking: Build and maintain daily habits with visual streak counters to stay motivated and consistent.
Routine management: Organize morning, evening, or custom routines with flexible scheduling and completion tracking.
Goal setting: Define personal goals and track progress over time with milestone markers and achievement views.
Reminders: Set notifications for habits and routines to ensure you never miss important daily activities.
Mobile-friendly interface: Access your habits and routines from any device with a responsive, touch-optimized design.
Streak visualization: View your consistency with calendar heatmaps and charts that highlight your commitment patterns.
Custom categories: Group habits by type or area of life for better organization and focused tracking.
Progress analytics: Review completion rates and trends to understand your behavior and adjust your approach.
Privacy-focused: Keep all habit data on your own server with no third-party tracking or data sharing.
Quick logging: Mark habits complete with a single tap for fast daily check-ins without friction.
Historical data: Access complete history of all habits and routines to see long-term patterns and growth.
Flexible scheduling: Set habits for specific days, frequencies, or custom intervals that match your lifestyle.
